problem_text_cn: 如图,直线AB与EF相交于点M,∠EMB=88°,∠1=60°,要使AB∥CD,则将直线AB绕点M逆时针旋转的度数为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, the straight line AB and EF intersect at the point M, ∠EMB = N_0, ∠1 = N_1, to make AB ∥ CD, the degree of rotation of the straight line AB counterclockwise around the point M is ()
raw_answer: 要使AB//CD,则∠EMB=∠1=60°,而∠EMB=88°所以直线AB绕点M逆时针旋转的度数=88°-60°=28°故选A.
